page.normal_text:
The calibration coefficients present a linear trend with DSL.
The calibration coefficients present a linear trend with DSL.

Annual periodicity exists especially in the short-wave and the water vapor channels.
Annual periodicity exists especially in the short-wave and the water vapor
channels.

Apparent Reflectance = Scale * (DN_EarthView - DN_SpaceView) (%)
Apparent Reflectance = Scale * (DN_EarthView - DN_SpaceView) (%)

Scale = d + c * Days = d*(1 + RatePerDay/100 * Days) (%/DN)

page.enlisting:
• The short-wave channels have large degradation, especially channel 8 with the annual decay rate up to 14%. • In the red and near-infrared bands (600 ~ 900nm), e.g. channel 3,4,13,14,15 and 16, the calibration coefficients almost have no change with the annual decay rate below 1%. • The short-wave channels have large degradation, especially channel 8 with the annual decay rate up to 14%.
